verses.verse: I <S%G1510>am<s%> the <S%G228>true<s%> <S%G288>vine,<s%> and my <S%G3962>Father<s%> is the farmer. <S%G1092><s%>

<S%G3956>Every<s%> <S%G2814>branch<s%> in me that <S%G5342>bears<s%> not <S%G2590>fruit<s%> he <S%G142>takes<s%> away: and every <S%G3956><s%> branch that <S%G5342>bears<s%> <S%G2590>fruit,<s%> he <S%G2508>purges<s%> it, that it may <S%G5342>bring<s%> forth <S%G4119>more<s%> fruit. <S%G2590><s%>
<S%G2235>Now<s%> you are <S%G2513>clean<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> I have <S%G2980>spoken<s%> to you.

<S%G3306>Abide<s%> in me, and I in you. As the <S%G2814>branch<s%> cannot <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1410><s%> <S%G5342>bear<s%> <S%G2590>fruit<s%> of <S%G1438>itself,<s%> <S%G3362>except<s%> it <S%G3306>abide<s%> in the <S%G288>vine;<s%> <S%G3761>no<s%> <S%G3761>more<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> you, <S%G3362>except<s%> you <S%G3306>abide<s%> in me.

I <S%G1510>am<s%> the <S%G288>vine,<s%> you are the <S%G2814>branches:<s%> He that <S%G3306>stays<s%> in me, and I in him, the <S%G3778>same<s%> <S%G5342>brings<s%> forth <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G2590>fruit:<s%> for <S%G5565>without<s%> me you <S%G1410>can<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> nothing. <S%G3762><s%>

<S%G1437>If<s%> a <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G3306>abide<s%> not in me, he is <S%G906>cast<s%> <S%G1854>forth<s%> as a <S%G2814>branch,<s%> and is <S%G3583>withered;<s%> and men <S%G4863>gather<s%> them, and cast <S%G906><s%> them <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G4442>fire,<s%> and they are burned. <S%G2545><s%>

<S%G1437>If<s%> you <S%G3306>abide<s%> in me, and my <S%G4487>words<s%> <S%G3306>abide<s%> in you, you shall <S%G154>ask<s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> you <S%G2309>will,<s%> and it shall be <S%G1096>done<s%> to you.

Herein <S%G1722><s%> <S%G5129><s%> is my <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G1392>glorified,<s%> that you <S%G5342>bear<s%> <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G2590>fruit;<s%> <S%G2532>so<s%> shall you be my disciples. <S%G3101><s%>
As the <S%G3962>Father<s%> has <S%G25>loved<s%> me, <S%G2504>so<s%> have I <S%G25>loved<s%> you: <S%G3306>continue<s%> you in my love. <S%G26><s%>

<S%G1437>If<s%> you <S%G5083>keep<s%> my <S%G1785>commandments,<s%> you shall <S%G3306>abide<s%> in my <S%G26>love;<s%> <S%G2531>even<s%> as I have <S%G5083>kept<s%> my <S%G3962>Father's<s%> <S%G1785>commandments,<s%> and <S%G3306>abide<s%> in his love. <S%G26><s%>
<S%G5023>These<s%> things have I <S%G2980>spoken<s%> to you, that my <S%G5479>joy<s%> might <S%G3306>remain<s%> in you, and that <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G5479>joy<s%> might be full. <S%G4137><s%>
<S%G3778>This<s%> is my <S%G1785>commandment,<s%> That you <S%G26>love<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another,<s%> as I have <S%G25>loved<s%> you.

<S%G3187>Greater<s%> <S%G26>love<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>man<s%> than <S%G5026>this,<s%> that a <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G5087>lay<s%> down his <S%G5590>life<s%> for his friends. <S%G5384><s%>
You are my <S%G5384>friends,<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> you <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G3745>whatever<s%> I <S%G1781>command<s%> you.

From now <S%G3765>on<s%> I <S%G3004>call<s%> you not <S%G1401>servants;<s%> for the <S%G1401>servant<s%> <S%G1492>knows<s%> not <S%G5101>what<s%> his <S%G2962>lord<s%> <S%G4160>does:<s%> but I have <S%G2046>called<s%> you <S%G5384>friends;<s%> for <S%G3956>all<s%> things that I have <S%G191>heard<s%> of my <S%G3962>Father<s%> I have <S%G1107>made<s%> <S%G1107>known<s%> to you.

You have not <S%G1586>chosen<s%> me, but I have <S%G1586>chosen<s%> you, and <S%G5087>ordained<s%> you, that you should <S%G5217>go<s%> and <S%G5342>bring<s%> forth <S%G2590>fruit,<s%> and that <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2590>fruit<s%> should <S%G3306>remain:<s%> that whatever <S%G3748><s%> <S%G302><s%> you shall <S%G154>ask<s%> of the <S%G3962>Father<s%> in my <S%G3686>name,<s%> he may <S%G1325>give<s%> it you.
<S%G5023>These<s%> things I <S%G1781>command<s%> you, that you <S%G25>love<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> another. <S%G240><s%>
<S%G1487>If<s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%> <S%G3404>hate<s%> you, you <S%G1097>know<s%> that it <S%G3404>hated<s%> me before <S%G4412><s%> it hated you.

<S%G1487>If<s%> you were of the <S%G2889>world,<s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%> would <S%G5368>love<s%> his <S%G2398>own:<s%> but <S%G3754>because<s%> you are not of the <S%G2889>world,<s%> but I have <S%G1586>chosen<s%> you out of the <S%G2889>world,<s%> therefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%> <S%G3404>hates<s%> you.

<S%G3421>Remember<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> that I <S%G2036>said<s%> to you, The <S%G1401>servant<s%> is not <S%G3187>greater<s%> than his <S%G2962>lord.<s%> <S%G1487>If<s%> they have <S%G1377>persecuted<s%> me, they will <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1377>persecute<s%> you; <S%G1487>if<s%> they have <S%G5083>kept<s%> my <S%G3056>saying,<s%> they will <S%G5083>keep<s%> <S%G5212>yours<s%> also. <S%G2532><s%>
But <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> things will they <S%G4160>do<s%> to you for my <S%G3686>name's<s%> sake, <S%G3754>because<s%> they <S%G1097>know<s%> not him that <S%G3992>sent<s%> me.

<S%G1487>If<s%> I had not <S%G2064>come<s%> and <S%G2980>spoken<s%> to them, they <S%G2192>had<s%> not had <S%G266>sin:<s%> but <S%G3568>now<s%> they <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G4392>cloak<s%> for their sin. <S%G266><s%>
He that <S%G3404>hates<s%> me <S%G3404>hates<s%> my <S%G3962>Father<s%> also. <S%G2532><s%>

<S%G1487>If<s%> I had not <S%G4160>done<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> them the <S%G2041>works<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G3762>none<s%> <S%G243>other<s%> man <S%G4160>did,<s%> they <S%G2192>had<s%> not had <S%G266>sin:<s%> but <S%G3568>now<s%> have they <S%G2532>both<s%> <S%G3708>seen<s%> and <S%G3404>hated<s%> <S%G2532>both<s%> me and my Father. <S%G3962><s%>

But this comes to pass, that the <S%G3056>word<s%> might be <S%G4137>fulfilled<s%> that is <S%G1125>written<s%> in their <S%G3551>law,<s%> They <S%G3404>hated<s%> me <S%G1432>without<s%> a cause. <S%G1432><s%>

But <S%G3752>when<s%> the <S%G3875>Comforter<s%> is <S%G2064>come,<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> I will <S%G3992>send<s%> to you from the Father, <S%G3962><s%> even the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> of <S%G225>truth,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G1607>proceeds<s%> from the <S%G3962>Father,<s%> he shall <S%G3140>testify<s%> of me:
And you <S%G2532>also<s%> shall <S%G3140>bear<s%> <S%G3140>witness,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> you have <S%G2075>been<s%> with me from the beginning. <S%G746><s%>
